name: Adshead's Maps of Manchester (1851)
description: 24 illustrated maps of the township of Manchester divided into municipal wards. Hand-colored sheets showing mills/works (orange), public houses (pink), waterways (blue). Cross-hatching for public buildings, diagonal shading for warehouses/residences. Includes 1841 and 1851 population data.
notes:
IIIF manifest: https://www.digitalcollections.manchester.ac.uk/iiif/PR-C-00017-00070-MANCHESTER-00022
Image service: https://image.digitalcollections.manchester.ac.uk/iiif/PR-C-00017-00070-MANCHESTER-00022-000-00001.jp2 (24 sheets, -00001 to -00024)
CC BY-NC 4.0. Publisher: Joseph Adshead. 840x1040mm per sheet.
Not georeferenced — needs AllMaps or manual GCP alignment.
